name: Darkrunner
description:
Darkrunner is a short arcade racing game where player has to race in the dark dark night.

Controls

KeyboardControllerThrottleWRTReverseSLTBrakeSpaceBNitroShiftASteerA & DLeft StickPause menuPMenu Button
